attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is for people who want to stay in their homes who rent from their local councils , if you have living in the same house for over 30-40 yrs plus and then suddenly u are asked to move /downsize why must u have to move/leave why cant you stay where you are even though they say the house is too big for you ,then why cant u take in lodgers which would less the space in ur house

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
